title: Celebrating 25 Years of Chiyaan Vikram
text:
Email 4 
APART FROM THE RELEASE of the film 10 Endrathukulla this month, fans of Vikram have another reason to celebrate. He has now completed 25 years in the film industry. The actor, who is popularly known as Chiyaan Vikram, has won several awards including six Filmfare Awards, one National Film Award and a Tamil Nadu State Film Award. Vikram made his debut in the film En Kadhal Kanmani, which released on October 17, 1990. Since then he has acted in various Tamil, Malayalam and Telugu films including blockbusters like Sethu, Dhill, Gemini, Dhool, Saamy, Pithamagan, Anniyan, Kanthaswamy and Shankarâ€™s I. He has completed his 25th year grandly with the release of one of the most anticipated films of the year 10 Endrathukulla, set to hit the screens on October 21.
